New Records: Jordan Poole became the first Washington Wizards player to make 5+ three-pointers in five consecutive games
Key Match Events: Kyshawn George made a crucial 3-pointer to extend the Wizards' lead
Alexandre Sarr recorded a season-high-tying five assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards shot 49.5 percent from the field and 47.2 percent from 3-point range
The Bulls outrebounded the Wizards 44-42 but turned the ball over 20 times
